TriggerOraclev10g.name: c2_autoinsert_employees
TriggerOraclev10g.body: BEGIN<br/> INSERT INTO C2_ENTITIES (ENTITY_ID, VERSION)<br/> VALUES (C2_ENTITIES_SEQ.nextval, 0);<br/> <br/> INSERT INTO C2_ITEMS (ITEM_ID, LABEL)<br/> VALUES (C2_ENTITIES_SEQ.currval, 'PRACOWNIK #' || to_char(:employee.EMPLOYEE_ID));<br/><br/> INSERT INTO C2_ITEMS_EMPLOYEE (ITEM_ID, EMPLOYEE_ID)<br/> VALUES (C2_ENTITIES_SEQ.currval, :employee.EMPLOYEE_ID);<br/>END;
